value.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can eat corpses to gain some of their skill experience, as well as potentially heal {PAWN_objective}self of an injury or ailment. The chance to heal scales with the corpse's body size. Moreover, {PAWN_pronoun} defers incoming damage to nearby corpses or undead entities.
Random corpses appear near {PAWN_nameDef} as {PAWN_pronoun} spends psyfocus.{PAWN_pronoun} also cannot be harmed by the living dead, such as ghouls or shamblers.
